data.comment: The big names in today's match at VTB Arena have now been confirmed.
The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 2, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
In the minute 4, Dinamo Moscow will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
Arsenal Tula drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Arsenal Tula's Alesandr Lomovitskiy gets in a shot on goal at VTB Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 13, Arsenal Tula's Abdul Mohammed misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In the minute 15, Throw-in high up the field for Dinamo Moscow in Moscow.
Free kick Arsenal Tula.
Goran Causic of Arsenal Tula gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Arsenal Tula needs to be cautious. Dinamo Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Vyacheslav Grulev for Dinamo Moscow drives towards goal at VTB Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 23, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 25, Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at VTB Arena.
Kirill Panchenko (Arsenal Tula) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 28, Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
Dinamo Moscow's Daniil Lesovoy breaks free at VTB Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
In the minute 30, Can Arsenal Tula capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dinamo Moscow's half?
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Arsenal Tula's Kings Kangwa goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 32, Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the away team a throw-in.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In the minute 35, In Moscow Arsenal Tula attack through Kings Kangwa. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Arsenal Tula are pushing forward but Kirill Panchenko's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In the minute 40, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
Dinamo Moscow drives forward and Vyacheslav Grulev gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Dinamo Moscow's Nikola Moro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 41, Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
Arsenal Tula's Kings Kangwa is whistled for offside at VTB Arena.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow's Vyacheslav Grulev attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Daniil Fomin puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Konstantin Tyukavin is on a sub for Anton Terekhov for Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 52, Dinamo Moscow are coming forward and Sergey Parshivlyuk gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 53, It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at VTB Arena.
In the minute 55, Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
Daniil Fomin gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 57, Daniil Lesovoy for Dinamo Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at VTB Arena.
Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 58, Taras Burlak is replacing Kings Kangwa for Arsenal Tula at VTB Arena.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
Dmitri Parfenov (Arsenal Tula) is making a second substitution, with Igor Gorbatenko replacing Vladislav Panteleyev.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Dinamo Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 61, Vyacheslav Grulev (Dinamo Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Dinamo Moscow push forward at VTB Arena and Guillermo Varela gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Arsenal Tula defence.
In the minute 62, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a throw-in for Dinamo Moscow, close to Arsenal Tula's area.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 65, Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow's Nikola Moro misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
In the minute 71, Sebastian Szymanski (Dinamo Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Arsenal Tula.
Ivan Ordets (Dinamo Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 72, Dmitri Parfenov is making the team's third substitution at VTB Arena with Sergey Tkachyov replacing Abdul Mohammed.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Arsenal Tula close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 75, Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The home team have replaced Daniil Lesovoy with Clinton N'Jie. This is the second substitution made today by Sandro Schwarz.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Arsenal Tula's Aleksandr Dovbnya has been booked in Moscow.
Can Arsenal Tula capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dinamo Moscow's half?
In Moscow, Arsenal Tula push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Dinamo Moscow make their third substitution with Konstantin Rausch replacing Sergey Parshivlyuk.
Arsenal Tula drive upfield and Alesandr Lomovitskiy gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Dinamo Moscow defender.
In the minute 83, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Konstantin Tyukavin (Dinamo Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Arsenal Tula have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 85, Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sandro Schwarz (Dinamo Moscow) is making a fourth substitution, with Roman Neustadter replacing Daniil Fomin.
The home team replace Vyacheslav Grulev with Nikolay Komlichenko.
In the minute 87, Arsenal Tula's Nikolay Rasskazov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Yevgeni Lutsenko is replacing Kirill Panchenko for the away team.
In the minute 89, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
At VTB Arena the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
